Shardhost is a UK LTD company (reg 07679837) that has been providing hosting services since June 2011. We currently serve over 3500 clients. We own all of our VPS hardware.  

All services are currently being offered out of our racks in Dallas, Texas (TierPoint DC with Colorossing) and Colocrossing Buffalo.  

We've had a lot of interest in our Annual plans previously and are constantly asked to restock them so thought we'd apply this to as much of our services as possible.
